activities.name: LU-Metadata_source
activities.description: Metadata lookup for ROW data extraction

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
    om.application_name,
    ctrl.table_name,
    om.server_name,
    om.server_path as source_object_type,
    om.filename as dso_changelog_table,
    om.data_filename,
    om.pattern_type as pattern,
    om.container_name,
    om.archival_blob_name,
    om.stage_blob_name,
    om.blob_trigger_name,
    om.data_level,
    om.active_ind,
    om.parent_id,
    om.dataset_name,
    ctrl.dynamic_partition_ind,
    ctrl.partition_column,
    ctrl.incr_column_name,
    ctrl.last_incr_value,
    case
      when server_name = 'LS_KHCDE_PLP_PNG_STAT_SQLSERVER' then 'khcde-kv-sec-plp-png-stat-sql-conn-string'
	  when server_name = 'LS_KHCDE_PLP_CHINA_STAT' then 'khcde-kv-sec-plp-china-sql-conn-string'
    END AS key_vault_secret_name,
    case
	    when om.server_path = 'AWODSO' and dynamic_partition_ind='y' then concat('select a.*, b.REQUEST_TSN from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSPMREQUEST b on a.REQTSN = b.REQUEST_TSN where ?AdfHanaDynamicRangePartitionCondition and b."STORAGE" = ''AT'' AND b."REQUEST_STATUS" = ''GG'' and ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
		when om.server_path = 'AWODSO' and dynamic_partition_ind='n' then concat('select a.*, b.REQUEST_TSN from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSPMREQUEST b on a.reqtsn = b.REQUEST_TSN where  b."STORAGE" = ''AT'' AND b."REQUEST_STATUS" = ''GG'' and ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
		when om.server_path = 'WODSO' and dynamic_partition_ind='y' then concat('select a.*, b.datum_anf from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSSTATMANPART b on a.request = b.rnr where ?AdfHanaDynamicRangePartitionCondition and ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
        when om.server_path = 'WODSO' and dynamic_partition_ind='n' then concat('select a.*, b.datum_anf from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSSTATMANPART b on a.request = b.rnr where ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
        when om.server_path = 'DSO' and dynamic_partition_ind='y' then concat('select a.*, b.datum_anf from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSSTATMANPART b on a.request = b.odsrnr where ?AdfHanaDynamicRangePartitionCondition and ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
        when om.server_path = 'DSO' and dynamic_partition_ind='n' then concat('select a.*, b.datum_anf from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSSTATMANPART b on a.request = b.odsrnr where ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
		when om.server_path = 'CURRENT_DATE_DSO' and dynamic_partition_ind='y' then concat('select a.*, b.datum_anf from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSSTATMANPART b on a.request = b.odsrnr where ?AdfHanaDynamicRangePartitionCondition and ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
        when om.server_path = 'CURRENT_DATE_DSO' and dynamic_partition_ind='n' then concat('select a.*, b.datum_anf from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSSTATMANPART b on a.request = b.odsrnr where ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
		when om.server_path = 'CURRENT_DATE_WODSO' and dynamic_partition_ind='y' then concat('select a.*, b.datum_anf from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSSTATMANPART b on a.request = b.rnr where ?AdfHanaDynamicRangePartitionCondition and ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
        when om.server_path = 'CURRENT_DATE_WODSO' and dynamic_partition_ind='n' then concat('select a.*, b.datum_anf from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSSTATMANPART b on a.request = b.rnr where ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
		when om.server_path = 'Master' and dynamic_partition_ind='y' then concat('select * from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',ctrl.table_name,'" where ?AdfHanaDynamicRangePartitionCondition and ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
        when om.server_path = 'Master' and dynamic_partition_ind='n' then concat('select * from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',ctrl.table_name,'" where ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
        when om.server_path = 'HANAView' and dynamic_partition_ind='y' then concat('select * from "',ctrl.table_name,'" where ?AdfHanaDynamicRangePartitionCondition and ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
        when om.server_path = 'HANAView' and dynamic_partition_ind='n' then concat('select * from "',ctrl.table_name,'" where ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
		when om.server_path = 'SQL' and dynamic_partition_ind='y' then 
		case when lower(ctrl.table_name) like '% where %' then concat(ctrl.table_name,' and ?AdfHanaDynamicRangePartitionCondition and ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
		else concat(ctrl.table_name,' where ?AdfHanaDynamicRangePartitionCondition and ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT) end
        when om.server_path = 'SQL' and dynamic_partition_ind='n' then ctrl.table_name
    end as extraction_query,
	case		
	    when om.server_path = 'AWODSO' and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'') then concat('select max(b."REQUEST_TSN")  as max_incr_value from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join  @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSPMREQUEST b on a."REQTSN" = b."REQUEST_TSN" where substr(b.REQUEST_TSN,0,8) <= TO_VARCHAR(ADD_DAYS(CURRENT_DATE, -1),''yyyymmdd'') and b."STORAGE" = ''AT'' AND b."REQUEST_STATUS" = ''GG'' and ' ,ctrl.where_clause_FOR_MAX)
		when om.server_path = 'WODSO' and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'') then concat('select max(b.datum_anf) as max_incr_value from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSSTATMANPART b on a.request = b.rnr where b.datum_anf <= ADD_DAYS(CURRENT_DATE, -1) and ',ctrl.where_clause_FOR_MAX)
		when om.server_path = 'DSO' and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'') then concat('select max(b.datum_anf) as max_incr_value from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSSTATMANPART b on a.request = b.odsrnr where b.datum_anf <= ADD_DAYS(CURRENT_DATE, -1) and ',ctrl.where_clause_FOR_MAX)
		when om.server_path = 'CURRENT_DATE_DSO' and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'') then concat('select max(b.datum_anf) as max_incr_value from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSSTATMANPART b on a.request = b.odsrnr where ',ctrl.where_clause_FOR_MAX)
		when om.server_path = 'CURRENT_DATE_WODSO' and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'') then concat('select max(b.datum_anf) as max_incr_value from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',om.filename,'" a inner join @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}.RSSTATMANPART b on a.request = b.rnr where ',ctrl.where_clause_FOR_MAX)
        when om.server_path = 'Master' and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'') then concat('select max(',ctrl.incr_column_name,') as max_incr_value from @{pipeline().parameters.sap_schema}."',ctrl.table_name,'" where ',ctrl.where_clause_FOR_MAX)
        when om.server_path = 'HANAView' and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'') then concat('select max(',ctrl.incr_column_name,') as max_incr_value from "',ctrl.table_name,'" where ',ctrl.where_clause_FOR_MAX)
		when om.server_path = 'SQL' and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'') then concat('select max(',ctrl.incr_column_name,') as max_incr_value from (',ctrl.table_name,') as p')
		ELSE 'Select NULL as max_incr_value FROM DUMMY'
		end as max_incr_value_query
from dbo.khc_orchestration_metadata om inner join
( Select
    parent_id,
    table_name,
    dynamic_partition_ind,
    partition_column,
    where_clause,
    incr_column_name,
    last_incr_value,
    case
        when (where_clause is null or trim(where_clause)='') and (incr_column_name is null or trim(incr_column_name)='') then '1=1'
        when (where_clause is not null and trim(where_clause)<>'') and (incr_column_name is null or trim(incr_column_name)='') then where_clause
        when (where_clause is null or trim(where_clause)='') and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'' and trim(last_incr_value) <> '' and last_incr_value is not null) then concat(incr_column_name,' <= FETCH_SAP_MAX_EXTR_VAL and ',incr_column_name,' >= ',last_incr_value)
        when (where_clause is not null and trim(where_clause)<>'') and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'' and trim(last_incr_value) <> '' and last_incr_value is not null) then concat(incr_column_name,' <= FETCH_SAP_MAX_EXTR_VAL and ',incr_column_name,' >= ',last_incr_value ,' and ',where_clause)
		else '1=1'
    END as FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT,
	CASE when (where_clause is null or trim(where_clause)='') then '1=1' else where_clause END where_clause_FOR_MAX
from dbo.khc_data_extract_control_table
) ctrl
on om.parent_id = ctrl.parent_id
where len(trim(om.server_name)) > 0
  and len(trim(om.application_name)) > 0
  and len(trim(ctrl.table_name)) > 0
  and len(trim(om.server_path)) > 0
  and len(trim(om.filename)) > 0
  and len(trim(om.data_filename)) > 0
  and om.file_zip_ind in ('y', 'n')
  and om.file_checksum_ind in ('y', 'n')
  and len(trim(om.container_name)) > 0
  and len(trim(om.archival_blob_name)) > 0
  and len(trim(om.stage_blob_name)) > 0
  and ctrl.dynamic_partition_ind in ('y', 'n')
  and om.application_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.application_name}'
  and om.dataset_group like '@{pipeline().parameters.dataset_group}'
  and om.dataset_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.dataset_name}'
  and om.data_level=1 and om.active_ind='y'
  ORDER by om.parent_id ASC

activities.name: FE-Metadata
activities.description: For each entry the inner activities should trigger

activities.name: CP-SAP_KSTFI
activities.description: Prepare data extract query and execute on SAP to extract data from SAP

activities.name: FETCH_STAGE_FILE
activities.description: Check if earlier data extract files exist at satge location

activities.name: COPY_FILES_TO_STAGE
activities.description: Check the Execution Status and Delete files from Stage if exists and Copy the files to Archive & Stage Folders

activities.name: COPY_TO_STAGE
activities.description: Copy files from land to stage location for snowflake ingestion

activities.name: COPY_TO_ARCHIVE
activities.description: Copy files from land to Archive

defaultActivities.name: FAIL_THE_PIPE_LINE
defaultActivities.description: Force fail the pipeline as this is error path

activities.name: Audit_Log_Data_Extraction_Success
activities.description: This activity logs success of  Data Extract in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: Audit_Log_Data_Extraction_Failure
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Data Extract in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: IF_DELETE_STAGE_FILES
activities.description: Delete files at staging location if present from earlier run

ifTrueActivities.name: DELETE_STAGE_FILES
ifTrueActivities.description: Delete earlier files from stage location

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineFailed_DeleteStage
ifTrueActivities.description: Mark delete stage activity failure in audit logs.

activities.name: IE_DELETE_LAND_FILES
activities.description: Check for the valid land folder path and delete the files from land location

activities.name: GET_THE_EXT_DATE
activities.description: Get the Date of Extraction as of CST Time

activities.name: SP-PipelineStart
activities.description: This Activity logs starting of pipeline in khc_audit_logtable.

activities.name: SP-PipelineFailed1
activities.description: This activity logs pipeline failure in audit log

activities.name: SP-PipelineSuccess1
activities.description: This activity logs pipeline success in audit log
